meanings.definition: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel (1772–1829), a German poet, literary critic, philosopher, philologist and Indologist.
meanings.english_definition: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel (1772–1829), a German poet, literary critic, philosopher, philologist and Indologist.

meanings.definition: August Wilhelm Schlegel (1767–1845), a German poet, translator, literary critic, philologist and Indologist; brother of Karl.
meanings.english_definition: August Wilhelm Schlegel (1767–1845), a German poet, translator, literary critic, philologist and Indologist; brother of Karl.

etymology.value: From German Schlegel, a topographic name for someone who lived by a conspicuous boundary stone or a tool used for quarrying stones.
